welcome.title: Welcome to Salus
welcome.content: This brief introduction will show you how to use Salus to manage your health simply and effectively.

symptoms.title: Track your symptoms
symptoms.content: Record your symptoms daily to monitor your health. You'll be able to view statistics and analysis over time.

medications.title: Manage your medications
medications.content: Keep track of your medications, set reminders for taking them, and never miss a dose.

wellness.title: Monitor your wellness
wellness.content: Record mood, sleep, and physical activity for a complete picture of your wellbeing.

appointments.title: Manage your appointments
appointments.content: Organize your medical visits, receive reminders, and maintain a complete history.

ai.title: Salus AI
ai.content: Your personal health assistant. Ask questions, receive personalized advice, and manage your health with the help of artificial intelligence.
